document.full_text: singaporeans began voting on saturday in the most hotly contested parliamentary election since independence, although analysts say the ruling people's action party (pap) is almost certain to be returned to power in the wealthy city-state.
document.title: voting begins in singapore polls
lines_and_colors: singaporeans began voting on saturday in the most hotly contested parliamentary election since independence, although analysts say the ruling people's action party (pap) is almost certain to be returned to power in the wealthy city-state.
